title: Self-Reflexive Development of Promptotyping Documentation
summary: The methodology was used to document itself, demonstrating recursive application

context.project_background: Need to document and share the Promptotyping methodology
context.problem_statement: How to present a methodology that emerged from practice rather than theory
constraints: Balance academic rigor with practical accessibility

phases_used.description: Created README.md defining what Promptotyping is and why it exists
Documented data structures: Phase, Document, Validation, Project State
Tested different presentation approaches (academic vs practical)
Defined what the documentation must accomplish

critical_interventions.impact: Reduced from 50+ pages to focused practical guide

critical_interventions.intervention: Removed all percentages and time claims

implementation.technical_approach: Static website with embedded methodology documentation

limitations: Difficult to avoid methodology becoming prescriptive

lessons_learned.insight: Practice-based documentation more valuable than theory
lessons_learned.evidence: Examples and cases more useful than abstract principles
Each version became simpler and more practical

methodological_reflection.phase_flexibility: All phases used but adapted throughout
